titleStmt.title: A short view of the lives of those illustrious princes, Henry Duke of Glovcester, and Mary Princess of Orange deceased, late brother and sister of His Majesty the King of Great Brittain collected by T.M. Esq., to whome the same will serve a rule & pattern.
titleStmt.author: Manley, Thomas, 1628-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for a Society of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: Written by Thomas Manley. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
